
Day 01 of # 100-days-of-code

def FrequentWords(Text, k):
    words = []
    freq = FrequencyMap(Text, k)

Most frequent words in oriC of Vibrio cholerae:
If Text is the oriC of Vibrio cholerae is  and k = 10 (e.g.  if k =3, it is a trimer or 3-mer and so on), what are the most frequent words?

This is a bioinformatics project as a part of Bioprogramming course by UCSD on Coursera.
